title: Adrift
description:
A low-poly survival game in a multi-dimensional realm. Collect resources and craft tools to fully automate your world!
In game, you can access a help menu by pressing [ESC] and then clicking "Help."
tagline: A survival game which takes place in a multi-dimensional realm.

changelog.title: Launcher Release
changelog.content: Adrift has been released on the Redlabs Launcher!
